Reservations

In the Restaurant El Yate in Madrid, we are expert organizing all types of events with our clients, such as company dinners, birthdays, stag / hen night, little gigs, tastings and any type of party.
You can contact with us ( if you only speak english is better contact us by email, thank you ) :
  • Address: Paseo General Martínez Campos 41, Madrid. (Restaurante El Yate)
  • Phone: (+34) 91 319 10 37
  • Email: info@elyatemadrid.es
In addition you can make a reservation in the below form:

Paseo General Martínez Campos 41

91 319 10 37

info@elyatemadrid.es
